reasoning: Basaloid carcinoma is a specific histological subtype of anal carcinoma. Anal cancer incidence ~1-2 per 100k globally; basaloid variant represents ~20-30% of anal cancers. Estimated 0.15-0.3 per 100k. Based on cancer registries with histological subtype data.
source: GLOBOCAN 2005 (IARC), including histological subtype analysis from WHO classification
